| HistoryText             = The [[Cotati]] helped [[Samuel Smithers (Earth-616)|Plantman]] unlock his potential in exchange for helping them rid the world of all animal life during the [[Empyre (Earth-616)|Empyrean]] invasion. His new powers allowed him to create humanoid plant-life in [[Manhattan]] that would fight by his side, by quickly growing seeds in water. He named these beings "Sprout Soldiers and they were resistant to even bullets, although a very strong physical attack or strong herbicides could kill them, something that was discovered by [[Luke Cage (Earth-616)|Luke Cage]] and [[James Bradley (Earth-616)|Doctor Nemesis]]. As the two finished dealing with the Sprout Soldiers, [[Vision (Earth-616)|Vision]] increased the temperature of the water where they were breeding after subduing Plantman, resulting in their destruction.{{r|Empyre: Avengers Vol 1 2|3}}

==Powers and Abilities==
===Powers===
* '''Superhuman Durability''': They are impervious to bullets.{{r|Empyre: Avengers Vol 1 3}}

===Weaknesses===
* '''Nano-Herbicides''': Nano-herbicides, capable of destroying plants at a very small-scale, can also kill Sprout Soldiers.{{r|Empyre: Avengers Vol 1 3}}
* '''Water dependency:''' They require water at normal temperature to breed. Hot temperature will quickly result in their deaths.{{r|Empyre: Avengers Vol 1 3}}
